name: Pagination.Root

perPage.description: The number of items per page.
perPage.description_zh: The number of items per page.

siblingCount.description: The number of page triggers to show on either side of the current page.
siblingCount.description_zh: The number of page triggers to show on either side of the current page.

page.description: The selected page. You can bind this to a variable to control the selected page from outside the component.
page.description_zh: The selected page. You can bind this to a variable to control the selected page from outside the component.

onPageChange.description: A function called when the selected page changes.
onPageChange.description_zh: A function called when the selected page changes.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root pagination component which contains all other pagination components.
